subject: Basketball
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: A fund used to pay off bonds that financed the $250 million FedEx Forum could be pushed into the red by 2022 if the N.B.A. lockout lasts the entire year, a situation that would force the city of Memphis and Shelby County, Tenn., to pay the shortfall.
snippet: A fund used to pay off bonds that financed the $250 million FedEx Forum could be pushed into the red by 2022 if the N.B.A. lockout lasts the entire year, a situation that would force the city of Memphis and Shelby County, Tenn., to pay the shortfall.
